isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payProvider(address,uint256,uint256,uint.details: Gelato Provider risks:    - _getId does not match actual InstaMemory gelatoProvider payment slot    - _token balance not in DSA    - worthless _token risk payable to be compatible in conjunction with DSA.cast payable target

params._amt: The amount of _token to pay the Gelato Provider.
params._getId: The InstaMemory slot at which the payment amount was stored.
params._setId: The InstaMemory slot to save the gelatoProvider payout amound in.
params._token: The token used to pay the Provider.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

payProvider(address,uint256,uint256,uint.notice: Transfers automation gas fees to Gelato Provider

setProvider(address).notice: Set the gelatoProvider address that will be paid for executing a task

userdoc.notice: InstaDapp Connector to compensate Gelato automation-gas Providers.
